meanings.definition: To cause to be in a certain condition
meanings.sent1: The rain en the road slippery.
meanings.sent2: The sun en the room bright.
meanings.sent3: The wind en the day cold.
meanings.sent4: The fire en the room warm.
meanings.sent5: The chef en the dish spicy.
